title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Modify the Hide and Seek game with three sprites. Add one more sprite and make required adjustments for the other sprites. Program the third sprite to do the same actions as the other two sprites.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
